carouselItems.name: React Date Selector
carouselItems.description: A better date selection experience from the ground up-- custom input and date logic.

carouselItems.name: Restaurant Reviews
carouselItems.description: A map-based restaurant search application. The application is fully responsive and follows offline first principles.

carouselItems.name: Dodge 'em
carouselItems.description: This is a mobile friendly game that can be played with either the onscreen directional pad or a keyboard directional pad. The game is very simailar to frogger.

carouselItems.name: Concentrate
carouselItems.description: This is a card matching game. Click on a card to reveal its icon. Match all the card pairs to win the game. For a more detailed explanation of the rules please visit the technical documentaion by clicking the link below.

carouselItems.name: Trivia Game
carouselItems.description: This is a multiple choice quiz application that tests a user's knowledge of javascript array methods. See how many answers you can get correct!
